EmailTemplate.description: Email to partner notifying them that their lead's contract has been executed
EmailTemplate.name: 6. Lead's Contract Has Been Fully Executed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name}’s Community Solar Contract Has Been Executed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c},
Congratulations - {!Opportunity.Name}’s Community Solar contract has been fully executed!
{!Opportunity.Name} will receive a welcome package to guide them through the billing process and help set up their BlueWave Community Solar Portal.
Thanks for partnering with us to revolutionize energy
- All of us here at BlueWave
partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com (888) 817-2703
Learn More About Us
bluewavesolar.com
